onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.javaparsonsproblems.MainActivity
Initialises the 'Home Screen' activity by setting the content view and fetching the studentLVLs.txt file or creating it if does not exist.
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.javaparsonsproblems.ProblemActivity
Initiates each problem by fetching appropriate content view, tagging all lines as draggable, displaying 'NEXT' button as invisible, initialising media players for sound, and setting the text for each of the problem components.
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.javaparsonsproblems.ScoresActivity
Initialises the Activity by setting TextViews to display the scores for each topic.
onDrag(View, DragEvent) - Method in class com.example.javaparsonsproblems.ProblemActivity
Method to facilitate the dragging of one line from one layout container to another.
onTouch(View, MotionEvent) - Method in class com.example.javaparsonsproblems.ProblemActivity
Method to trigger the line dragging mechanism once a line has been touched.
